title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, April 27, 2022
description: It’s the birthday of Mary Wollstonecraft, born in 1759. Her book “A Vindication of the Rights of Woman” is one of the earliest books of feminist philosophy.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Mary Wollstonecraft, born in 1759. Her book “A Vindication of the Rights of Woman” is one of the earliest books of feminist philosophy.
